Australian writer Yang Hengjun sentenced by Beijing court - friendA Beijing court on Monday handed Australian writer Yang Hengjun a suspended death sentence, a family friend said, five years after he was first detained in China and three years after a closed-door trial on espionage charges. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 02:45:54 GMT HMTNVGUQQBO4DHC5X2SVEIGOYY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australian-yang-hengjun-handed-suspended-death-sentence-by-beijing-court-2024-02-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
Insight: China bets on open-source chips as US export controls mountWhen a Beijing-based military institute in September published a patent for a new high-performance chip, it offered a glimpse of China's bid to remake the half-trillion dollar global chip market and withstand U.S. sanctions. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 02:11:30 GMT DNGTDML65RIA3BKNXB54QNIOT4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/china-bets-open-source-chips-us-export-controls-mount-2024-02-05/Eduardo Baptista技术
Investors dig into India's stock market as China flounders, discount risksIndia's $4 trillion stock market is pulling in billions of dollars of domestic and foreign money as investors flock to a fast-growing alternative to China, brushing aside risks around overpriced shares, upcoming elections and regulatory uncertainty. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 02:07:45 GMT WVQAH7OV65NUNHPAC6TEKATCGY https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/investors-dig-into-india-stock-market-china-flounders-discount-risks-2024-02-05/Jaspreet Kalra, Jayshree Pyasi市场宏观问题
Asian stocks slump as traders dial back rate cut betsAsian shares fell on Monday and the dollar climbed after a robust U.S. jobs report dashed any expectations of a near-term interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve, while stocks in China stocks remained on the back foot on weak sentiment. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 02:05:36 GMT MHMKNFHE7FO5JOSVLTSHE25ZBU https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-02-05/Ankur Banerjee市场
China's Jan services activity expands at slower pace - Caixin PMIChina's services activity expanded at a slightly slower pace in January as new orders fell, a private-sector survey showed on Monday, suggesting a soft start for the world's No.2 economy amid tepid demand and a property slump. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 01:59:19 GMT G7BMAIDKCBIJZPX3GHJCBGPD3Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-non-services-activity-expands-slower-pace-caixin-pmi-2024-02-05/Reuters市场宏观问题
Dollar scales fresh peaks as Fed cut bets recedeThe dollar rose to an eight-week high against its major peers on Monday as traders clawed back bets for aggressive rate cuts by the Federal Reserve this year in view of a still-resilient U.S. economy. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 01:25:53 GMT HZ5OVIQTQNMEDOWPBSAEJ2462U https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-scales-fresh-peaks-fed-cut-bets-recede-2024-02-05/Rae Wee市场货币
